name: Speed Demon (Mayonaka88)
description:
Speed Demon is a fast-paced atmospheric arcade-like endless 2d runner where you control a car on a highway while avoiding crashing into other cars.

With music blasting through the whole ride, see how fast you can go before you crash!

Controls:

Up/Down arrow keys = Up/Down

Z and X to control the volume of the music

C to change the song

Esc = Exit/Main Menu

R to change to the royalty-free playlist
